tooltip.title: Ampicillin Resistance Gene
tooltip.subtitle: Use: provides resistance against ampicillin antibiotic.
tooltip.explanation: Beta-lactamase coding sequence, enzyme that catalyzes the hydrolysis of penicillins.

tooltip.title: Terminator 1
tooltip.subtitle: Use: necessary to determine the end of a device.
tooltip.explanation: Strong transcription terminator sequence - Double terminator.

tooltip.title: GFP Gene
tooltip.subtitle: Use: exhibits bright green fluorescence when exposed to light in the blue to ultraviolet.

tooltip.title: Hyperflagellation Operon
tooltip.subtitle: Use: increases the number of flagella and consequently the motility speed.
tooltip.explanation: FlhDC master operon that produces an hexameric transcription factor activating flagella synthesis.

tooltip.title: pCons Promoter
tooltip.subtitle: Use: initiates expression of downstream genes in all circumstances.

tooltip.title: pLac Promoter
tooltip.subtitle: Use: initiates expression of downstream genes; activity inhibited by 'CAP' and 'LacI'.
tooltip.explanation: Natural promoter from the LacZYA operon coupled with 'CAP' and 'LacI' binding sites.

tooltip.title: pTet Promoter
tooltip.subtitle: Use: initiates expression of downstream genes; activity inhibited by 'TetR'.
tooltip.explanation: Promoter coupled with two tetR binding sequences.

tooltip.title: RBS medium
tooltip.subtitle: Use: determines the level of expression of downstream gene.
tooltip.explanation: Ribosome Binding Site sequence with medium low translation initialization.

tooltip.title: RBS low
tooltip.subtitle: Use: determines the level of expression of downstream gene.
tooltip.explanation: Ribosome Binding Site sequence with weak translation initialization.

tooltip.title: Green fluorescence (low)
tooltip.subtitle: Equipped: your bacterium becomes green fluorescent when exposed to blue light.
tooltip.explanation: Constant level of expression at 12.6% of the 'Green fluorescent protein' gene.

tooltip.title: Green fluorescence (med)
tooltip.subtitle: Equipped: your bacterium becomes green fluorescent when exposed to blue light.
tooltip.explanation: Constant level of expression at 23% of the 'Green fluorescent protein' gene.

tooltip.title: Hyperflagellation (low)
tooltip.subtitle: Equipped: increases swimming speed at 100% expression.
tooltip.explanation: Constant level of expression at 12.6% of the 'FlhDC master operon' coding sequence leading to flagella synthesis.

tooltip.title: Hyperflagellation (med)
tooltip.subtitle: Equipped: increases swimming speed at 100% expression.
tooltip.explanation: Constant level of expression at 23% of the 'FlhDC master operon' coding sequence leading to flagella synthesis.

tooltip.title: Regulated green fluorescence (low)
tooltip.subtitle: Equipped: your bacterium becomes green fluorescent when exposed to blue light.
tooltip.explanation: Constant level of expression at 12.6% of the 'Green fluorescent protein' gene.

tooltip.title: Regulated green fluorescence (med)
tooltip.subtitle: Equipped: your bacterium becomes green fluorescent when exposed to blue light.
tooltip.explanation: Constant level of expression at 23% of the 'Green fluorescent protein' gene.

tooltip.title: Regulated hyperflagellation (low)
tooltip.subtitle: Equipped: increases swimming speed at 100% expression.
tooltip.explanation: Constant level of expression at 12.6% of the 'FlhDC master operon' coding sequence leading to flagella synthesis.

tooltip.title: Regulated hyperflagellation (med)
tooltip.subtitle: Equipped: increases swimming speed at 100% expression.
tooltip.explanation: Constant level of expression at 23% of the 'FlhDC master operon' coding sequence leading to flagella synthesis.
